titleStmt.title: The Psalms of David in meeter: newly translated, and diligently compared with the originall text, and former translations, more plaine, smooth, and agreeable to the text, then any heretofore. ; Allowed by the authority of the General Assembly of the Kirk of Scotland, and appointed to be sung in congregations and families.
Bible. O.T. Psalms. English. 1650.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Includes index on [4] p. at end.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
